resources.string: Hello good day to you and today i will be your companion in exploring what values education is. . .
In this application we will learn the importance of values in our lives
By the way my name is Mary and I will be your teacher for this day.
With that all out of the way let us now start!
This word is derived from the Latin word "valere" which means to be worth, be strong-something intrinsically valuable, or desirable.
